title: VD
creator_credit: Richard Leacock and Holt, Rinehart and Winston
brief_description: The film was shot in cinema verite style at an information centre, a school and venereal disease clinics. Symptoms and treatment are explained as actual patients visit clinics. Discussion between patients and physicians emphasise a person’s responsibility to themselves and to others if there is a possibility of infection.
